name: MaFl_Eoners
oralText: Yay! I am so happy! Bubble smiles on us!
introText: I may not look like much, but I'm very powerful. I'm ready for anything! The Soldiers of Kion will prevail!

links.title: Who are you?
texts: My name is Eoners Archer and I am one of the hired soldier of Kion. We are here to protect the citizen of Flarine, as long as the money is right. *wink*
